main event: A bright silver colored object was spotted over Robins AFB for about 3 minutes on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was round or elliptical in shape and appeared to be hovering at times., The object was first observed over the base, then continued westward and disappeared from view., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The observer was looking in an easterly direction when attention was attracted by the sight of the object., The weather conditions at the time were clear with a temperature of 38Â°F.
witness description: A civilian observer whose name has been withheld for privacy.
